sqlReaderQuery.value:
select
*
from [dbo].[Tickets]
where TransactionDt > '@{activity('ACT_GEN_LKP_GetOldWatermark').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}'
  and TransactionDt <= '@{activity('ACT_GEN_LKP_GetNewWatermark').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}';

transformations.description: Add new Insert and Update columns
